湉字的基本解释

湉
tián
〔湉湉〕形容水面平静，如：“白露烟分光的的，微涟风定翠湉湉”。

湉字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tián］
［《廣韻》徒兼切，平添，定。］
见“澶湉”、“湉湉”。

湉字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　湉； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页636第21
【廣韻】【集韻】?徒兼切，音甜。澶湉，安流貌。【左思·吳都賦】澶湉漠而無涯。

湉字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
湉字的起名意思

：形容水面平静。

Shi
Basic explanation of words
Shi
tián
〔湉湉] Describes the calm water surface, such as: "The white dew and smoke are divided into light, and the slight breeze sets the Cuiyan 湉."
Shi
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［tián］
["Guangyun" is both apprentice and cut, flattened, fixed. ]
See "Chanxi" and "Chanxi".
Shi
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Siji 1】【Water Word Department】　湉; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 636 No. 21
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Apprentice and cut, sweet sound. Chan Wan, An Liu looks. [Zuo Si·Wu Du Fu] Chan Wan is indifferent and boundless.
